trans-unit.note: Refers to the installed version. For example: "Release Version: 1.23"

trans-unit.source: A fast, secure and easy to use VPN. Built by the makers of Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Una VPN rápida, segura y fácil de usar. Hecha por los creadores de Firefox.

trans-unit.note: The abbreviation for Internet Protocol. This is followed by the user’s IP address.
The abbreviation for Internet Protocol. This is followed by the user’s IPv4 address.
The abbreviation for Internet Procol version 6. This is followed by the user’s IPv6 address.
Message displayed to the user when the connection is unstable or missing, asking them to check their connection.
This refers to the user’s internet connection.

trans-unit.source: Turn on to protect your privacy

trans-unit.note: This refers to the user’s internet connection.

trans-unit.target: Desenmascarar la conexión y la ubicación

trans-unit.note: Switches from location 1 to location 2
%1 is the number of days. Note: there is currently no support for proper plurals
%1 is the number of hours.

trans-unit.source: Added less than an hour ago
trans-unit.target: Agregado hace menos de una hora

trans-unit.note: Example: "deviceName deviceDescription"
Label used for accessibility on the button to remove a device. %1 is the name of the device.

trans-unit.source: You’ve reached the device limit. To turn on the VPN on this device, you’ll need to remove one.
trans-unit.target: Se alcanzó el límite de dispositivos. Para habilitar la VPN en este dispositivo se necesita eliminar otro.

trans-unit.note: Go back
Used as accessibility description for the connection info: %1 is the localized label for “Upload” or “Download”, %2 is the speed value, %3 is the localized unit. Example: “Upload: 10 Mbps”.
%1 is the name of the device being removed. The name is displayed on purpose on a new line.
trans-unit.source: Please confirm you would like to remove %1.

trans-unit.note: This is the “remove” device button.
The title for the list of cities.
%1 is replaced by the subscription duration in months. %2 is replaced by the total subscription cost.
“/month” stands for “per month”. %1 is replaced by the monthly cost (including currency).
Appears on the in-app purchase view beside a subscription plan. "%1" is replaced by the percentage amount saved when selecting that plan.

trans-unit.target: Error de servicio en segundo plano
Se cerró la sesión y se desconectó el dispositivo

trans-unit.source: Operation not allowed from current location
trans-unit.target: Operación no permitida desde la ubicación actual

trans-unit.note: Restore a service in case of error.
Associated to a group of settings that require the VPN to be disconnected to change
trans-unit.target: La VPN debe estar desactivado para editar estos ajustes
trans-unit.source: VPN must be off to edit these settings

trans-unit.note: Main text telling the user that we are asking for permission to send a crash report.
trans-unit.target: La aplicación Mozilla VPN se cerró inesperadamente. ¿Te gustaría enviar un informe de fallos para ayudar a solucionar el problema?
trans-unit.source: The Mozilla VPN app quit unexpectedly. Would you like to send a crash report to help fix the issue?

trans-unit.note: User does not agree to send a crash report.
Label over description text section.
User agrees to send a crash report.
This refers to the current IP address, i.e. "IP: Loading".

trans-unit.source: The Mozilla VPN is successfully installed. You’re ready to start taking control of your online privacy.
trans-unit.target: La VPN de Mozilla se instaló correctamente. Está todo listo para que empieces a tomar el control de tu privacidad en línea.

trans-unit.source: A previous installation of Mozilla VPN exists at /Applications/Mozilla VPN.app. This installer will remove the previous installation prior to installing. Please back up any data before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: Existe una instalación previa de Mozilla VPN en /Aplicaciones/Mozilla VPN.app. Este instalador eliminará la instalación anterior antes de instalarla. Hacé una copia de seguridad de cualquier dato antes de continuar.

trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN requires Mac OS X 10.6 or later.
trans-unit.target: La VPN de Mozilla requiere Mac OS X 10.6 o superior.

trans-unit.source: You will now be guided through the installation steps for the Mozilla VPN. Thank you for choosing your VPN from the trusted pioneer of internet privacy.
trans-unit.target: Ahora se te guiará a través de los pasos de instalación de Mozilla VPN. Gracias por elegir tu VPN del pionero confiable de la privacidad en Internet.
Hacé clic en "Continuar" para continuar con la configuración.

trans-unit.note: Shown as message body in a notification. %1 is the country, %2 is the city.
Shown as message body in a notification. %1 is the country, %2 is the city.
Shown as message body in a notification. %1 and %3 are countries, %2 and %4 are cities.
Refers to the app - which is currently running the background and waiting
Button label
Search bar placeholder text
Header for the list of apps protected by VPN
trans-unit.target: Excluir aplicaciones de la protección VPN
Proteger todas las aplicaciones con VPN

trans-unit.source: VPN protects all apps by default. Turn off to choose which apps Mozilla VPN should not protect.
trans-unit.target: VPN protege todas las aplicaciones por defecto. Desactivá para elegir qué aplicaciones no debería proteger Mozilla VPN.

trans-unit.note: Associated to a group of settings that require the VPN to be disconnected to change
trans-unit.target: La VPN debe estar desconectada para editar los permisos de la aplicación
trans-unit.source: VPN must be off to edit App Permissions
When you submit feedback, Mozilla VPN will collect technical and interaction data, including your IP address, to help us improve. This data won’t be associated with your Firefox account.
trans-unit.target: Al enviar tu opinión, Mozilla VPN recopilará información técnica y de interacción, incluida la dirección IP, para ayudarnos a mejorar. Esta información no se asociará con la cuenta de Firefox.

trans-unit.source: We’d love to know what we can do to improve Mozilla VPN. Please share any specific feedback here.
trans-unit.target: Nos encantaría saber qué podemos hacer para mejorar la Mozilla VPN. Compartí cualquier opinión específica aquí.

trans-unit.source: We’re glad you’re enjoying Mozilla VPN! Please let us know how we can make your experience even better.
trans-unit.target: ¡Nos alegra que estés disfrutando de la VPN de Mozilla! Contanos cómo podemos mejorar tu experiencia.

trans-unit.source: We’re sorry to hear you’ve had a poor experience. Please let us know how we can improve.
trans-unit.target: Lamentamos escuchar que tuviste una mala experiencia. Hacenos saber cómo podemos mejorar.
Aviso de privacidad sobre Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: How would you describe your Mozilla VPN experience so far?
trans-unit.target: ¿Cómo describirías tu experiencia con Mozilla VPN hasta ahora?

trans-unit.source: We appreciate your feedback. You’re helping us improve Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.target: Te agradecemos tu opinión. Nos estás ayudando a mejorar Mozilla VPN.

trans-unit.note: This string is read by accessibility tools. %1 is the language name, %2 is the localized language name.
Description for the language switcher toggle when "Use system language" is enabled.
trans-unit.target: La VPN de Mozilla usará el idioma predeterminado del sistema.
trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN will use the default system language.

trans-unit.note: Tooltip for the language switcher toggle
trans-unit.target: Deshabilitar para seleccionar un idioma diferente
trans-unit.source: Disable to select a different language

trans-unit.note: Title for the language switcher toggle.

trans-unit.source: Access printers, streaming sticks and all other devices on your local network
trans-unit.target: Acceder a impresoras, dispositivos de transmisión y todos los demás dispositivos en su red local
Alerta de portal de Wi-Fi para invitados

trans-unit.source: Get notified if a guest Wi-Fi portal is blocked due to VPN connection
trans-unit.target: Recibir una notificación si un portal Wi-Fi para invitados está bloqueado debido a una conexión VPN

trans-unit.source: Get notified when the connection status changes
trans-unit.target: Recibir notificación cuando cambie el estado de la conexión

trans-unit.source: Get notified when you successfully switched servers
trans-unit.target: Recibir una notificación cuando se cambie de servidor con éxito

trans-unit.source: Get notified if you connect to an unsecured Wi-Fi network
trans-unit.target: Recibir una notificación al conectar a una red Wi-Fi insegura

trans-unit.source: Waiting for sign in and subscription confirmation…
trans-unit.target: Esperando el inicio de sesión y la confirmación de la suscripción…

trans-unit.source: Unable to establish a connection at this time. We’re working hard to resolve the issue. Please try again shortly.
trans-unit.target: No se puede establecer una conexión en este momento. Estamos trabajando duro para resolver el problema. Intentalo de nuevo en breve.

trans-unit.source: You can quickly access Mozilla VPN from your status bar.
trans-unit.target: Podés acceder rápidamente a Mozilla VPN desde la barra de estado.

trans-unit.source: Visit our help center to learn more about managing your subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: Visitá nuestro centro de ayuda para obtener más información sobre cómo administrar tus suscripciones.
Aviso de privacidad sobre Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: Learn more about what data Mozilla collects and how it’s used.
trans-unit.target: Conocer más sobre los datos que recopila Mozilla y cómo se utilizan.

trans-unit.note: Example: You have "x of y" devices in your account, where y is the limit of allowed devices.
Accessibility description for current location of the VPN server
Select the Location of the VPN server
The + after the number stands for “more than”. If you change the number of countries here, please update ViewSubscriptionNeeded.qml too.

trans-unit.target: Sin restricciones de ancho de banda
No hay registros de actividad en línea

trans-unit.source: Encrypt your traffic so that it can’t be read by your ISP or eavesdroppers.
trans-unit.target: Cifrar el tráfico para que el ISP o los espías no puedan leerlo.

trans-unit.source: Pick a server in any country you want and hide your location to throw off trackers.
trans-unit.target: Elegí un servidor en cualquier país que quieras y ocultá tu ubicación para deshacerte de los rastreadores.

trans-unit.source: Stream, download, and game without limits, monthly caps or ISP throttling.
trans-unit.target: Transmita, descargue y juegue sin límites, límites mensuales o limitación de ISP.

trans-unit.source: We are committed to not monitoring or logging your browsing or network history.
trans-unit.target: Nos comprometemos a no monitorear ni registrar tu historial de navegación o de red.

trans-unit.note: %1 is the number of devices. Note: there is currently no support for proper plurals

trans-unit.source: Your connection will not be secure while you update.
trans-unit.target: Su conexión no será segura mientras actualiza.

trans-unit.source: Please update the app before you continue to use the VPN
trans-unit.target: Actualice la aplicación antes de continuar usando la VPN

trans-unit.source: We detected and fixed a serious bug. You must update your app.
trans-unit.target: Detectamos y arreglamos un error grave. Tiene que actualizar su aplicación.

trans-unit.note: A notification channel; so the user can subscribe to "General Notifications"

Used by screen readers to explain to users which item they are currently focused on, and how many items there are total in a group. For example, given a list with 15 items. If a user selects the 3rd item, we want the screen reader to read out "3 of 15". The %1 represents the index of the currently focused item by the screen reader. The %2 represents the total number of items in the group.

Used by screen readers to denote that a particular item is currently selected. For example, given a segmented control with 2 items, where the first item is currently selected. We want the screen reader to read out "Selected, <item name>". The %1 represents the name of the selected item.

trans-unit.source: You must turn off your VPN in order to see the portal, and turn it back on once you have logged in.
trans-unit.target: Podés desactivar tu VPN para poder ver el portal y activarla una vez que iniciés sesión.

trans-unit.source: You can turn on your VPN once you have gained internet access by logging in to the portal.
trans-unit.target: Podés activar tu VPN una vez que hayás obtenido acceso a internet conectándote al portal.

trans-unit.source: A captive portal is when the guest Wi-Fi you are using requires you to log in to get internet access.
trans-unit.target: Un portal cautivo es cuando el Wi-Fi que estás usando requiere que iniciés sesión para tener acceso a internet.

trans-unit.source: Looks like there was an unexpected error while trying to connect. Please try again or check your connection.
trans-unit.target: Parece que hubo un error inesperado al intentar conectarse. Volvé a intentarlo o revisá tu conexión.

trans-unit.note: This is a bullet item in the connection section for high speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for high speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for high speedtest results
Bits per second
Gigabits per second
Kilobits per second
Megabits per second
Latency of the connection
Terabits per second

trans-unit.source: At your current speed, here’s what your device is optimized for:

trans-unit.note: Headline for a list of suggestions for troubleshooting the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Parece que la conexión a la ubicación de este servidor está un poco lenta, podés probar:
trans-unit.source: It looks like the connection to this server location is a bit slow, you can try:

This is a bullet item in the connection section for medium speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for medium speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for medium speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection troubleshooting section
This is a bullet item in the connection troubleshooting section
This is a description for a checkbox on the crash reporter dialog.
trans-unit.target: No mostrar de nuevo. Enviar automáticamente informes de fallos a Mozilla.
trans-unit.source: Don’t show this again. Autosend crash reports to Mozilla.

trans-unit.note: Main window title

trans-unit.source: Block internet ads and harmful domains with VPN
trans-unit.target: Bloquear anuncios de Internet y dominios dañinos con la VPN
Usar DNS de bloqueo de publicidad y anti rastreo
Bloquear anuncios de Internet con la VPN
Usar DNS de bloqueo de publicidad
Bloquear dominios dañinos con la VPN

trans-unit.source: Resolve websites using a custom DNS
trans-unit.target: Resolver sitios web usando un DNS personalizado
Usar automáticamente DNS protegidos por la VPN de Mozilla

trans-unit.source: VPN must be off to change these settings
trans-unit.target: La VPN debe estar desactivada para cambiar estos ajustes

trans-unit.source: Invalid DNS, please try a new one
trans-unit.target: DNS no válido, probá con uno nuevo

trans-unit.source: To delete your VPN account, please sign in with your Firefox account password.
trans-unit.target: Para eliminar tu cuenta de VPN, conectate con la contraseña de tu cuenta de Firefox.

trans-unit.note: Text that belongs to a checkbox that the user has to check in order before they can delete their account.
trans-unit.target: Se eliminarán todos los complemento y temas que hayas publicado en addons.mozilla.org
trans-unit.source: Any extensions and themes that you’ve published to addons.mozilla.org will be deleted

trans-unit.note: Text that belongs to a checkbox that the user has to check in order before they can delete their account.
trans-unit.target: Todas las suscripciones que hayas pagado serán canceladas (excepto Pocket)
trans-unit.source: Any paid subscriptions you have will be cancelled (Except Pocket)

trans-unit.note: Text that belongs to a checkbox that the user has to check in order before they can delete their account.
trans-unit.target: Reactivar con este correo puede no restaurar tu información guardada
trans-unit.source: Reactivating with this email may not restore your saved information

trans-unit.note: Text that belongs to a checkbox that the user has to check in order before they can delete their account.
trans-unit.target: Podrías perder tu información guardada y otras funcionalidades dentro de los productos de Mozilla
trans-unit.source: You may lose saved information and features within Mozilla products

trans-unit.note: %1 is the email address that is associated with the current account
trans-unit.target: Tu cuenta de Firefox (%1) está conectada a los productos de Mozilla que te mantienen seguro y productivo en la web. Tomá en cuenta que al eliminar tu cuenta:
trans-unit.source: Your Firefox account (%1) is connected to Mozilla products that keep you secure and productive on the web. Please acknowledge that by deleting your account:

trans-unit.note: One of the answers on the feedback question about the user experience with the VPN client.

trans-unit.source: If you enjoy using Mozilla VPN, would you review it? Thanks for your support!
trans-unit.target: Si disfrutás usando la Mozilla VPN, ¿le harías una reseña? ¡Gracias por tu apoyo!

trans-unit.note: This string appears above the 'Sign up' button on mobile onboarding views
trans-unit.target: Registrate para empezar tu prueba de 7 días gratis.
trans-unit.source: Sign up to start your 7-day free trial.

trans-unit.target: Hubo un problema al confirmar la suscripción

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error has occurred, please try again. Visit our help center below to learn how to troubleshoot this issue or contact support.
trans-unit.target: Hubo un error inesperado, volvé a intentarlo. Visitá nuestro centro de ayuda a continuación para aprender cómo solucionar este problema o contactate con el equipo de ayuda.

trans-unit.note: Label for a clickable item in the Get-Help view
Action used in the context of an expandable/collapsible card component
Label for button used in intro modals to discover new features.
Action used in the context of an expandable/collapsible card component
Label for button used in intro modals to return to the app.
Fallback string for users who have not specified a Display Name.
This is a label displayed on the password creation screen.
User has requested to send a new email containing the 6-digit pin to confirm their email address.
trans-unit.target: Reenviamos el código a tu correo electrónico.
trans-unit.source: We’ve resent your code to your email.

trans-unit.note: User has been sent a verification email containing a code.
trans-unit.target: Abrí tu correo electrónico e ingresá el código de verificación que se envió.
trans-unit.source: Open your email and enter the verification code that was sent.
Enter your email address to continue using Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Ingresá tu dirección de correo electrónico para continuar usando Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.note: User message prompting user to finish creating their account to use Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.target: Terminá de crear tu cuenta de Firefox para continuar con Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.source: Finish creating your Firefox account to continue to Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.note: Non-op text that informs user about how Mozilla will not sell it to a third party.
trans-unit.target: Solo usamos tu correo electrónico para crear la cuenta o iniciar sesión. Nunca lo venderemos a terceros.
trans-unit.source: We only use your email to create your account or sign in. We will never sell it to a third party.

trans-unit.note: User provided did not provide a correct security code.
Generic message for when user submits incorrect email.
trans-unit.target: Córreo electrónico inválido. Intentá de nuevo

trans-unit.note: User is providing us an email that is not formatted correctly. Ex. jsmith&gmail.com
trans-unit.target: El formato de correo electrónico no está soportado. Intentá de nuevo con otro correo electrónico
trans-unit.source: Email format not supported. Please try again with a different email

trans-unit.note: User has submitted an invalid password.
This is a hint for the user - they must provide a password with at least 8 characters
This is a hint for the user - password they provide must not be a common password. Ex. password.
trans-unit.target: No debe ser una contraseña común
trans-unit.source: Must not be a common password

trans-unit.note: This is a hint for the user - they must provide a password that does not match their email.
trans-unit.target: No puede ser tu dirección de correo electrónico
trans-unit.source: Must not be your email address

trans-unit.note: App screen that informs the user there was an error signing them in - this is the message.
trans-unit.target: Para iniciar la sesión se requiere la cuenta de correo electrónico principal
trans-unit.source: Primary account email required for sign-in

trans-unit.note: App screen that informs the user there was an error sending them their verification code email - this is the message.
trans-unit.target: Disculpá, no pudimos enviarte un código de verificación.
trans-unit.source: Sorry, we were unable to send you a verification code.

trans-unit.note: App screen that informs the user there was an error sending them their verification code email - this is the title.
App screen that informs the user there was an error signing them in - this is the message.
trans-unit.target: Disculpá, no pudimos iniciar sesión en tu cuenta.
trans-unit.source: Sorry, we were unable to sign you in to your account.

trans-unit.note: App screen that informs the user we are having a problem signing them in - this is the title.
Checkbox label for users to opt in, when creating an account, to receive product update emails from Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Me gustaría recibir correos electrónicos de actualización de productos de Firefox.
trans-unit.source: I’d like to receive product update emails from Firefox.
To continue, please confirm with your Firefox account password.
trans-unit.target: Para continuar, confirmá con la contraseña de tu cuenta de Firefox.

trans-unit.note: This link allows the user to request for another 6-digit verification code to be sent to their email.
Placeholder text for input element asking user for TOTP 6-digit verification code.
Label for input asking user for their security code.
User is asked for a security code from their authentication app for verification.
trans-unit.target: Abrí tu aplicación de autenticación e ingresá el código de seguridad que proporciona.
trans-unit.source: Open your authentication app and enter the security code it provides.

trans-unit.note: Title for app screen asking user for their security code.
Placeholder text for input element asking user for 6-digit verification code from their email.
User has been unable to sign in correctly, they have a cool down period of 1 minute until they can try again.
trans-unit.target: Has hecho demasiados intentos de iniciar sesión. No podrás volver a intentarlo nuevamente con esta cuenta por 1 minuto.
trans-unit.source: You’ve made too many attempts to sign in. You won’t be able to try again with this account for 1 minute.

trans-unit.note: User has been unable to sign in correctly, they have a cool down period of 15 minutes until they can try again.
trans-unit.target: Hubo demasiados intentos para iniciar sesión. No podrás volver a intentarlo con esta cuenta durante 15 minutos.
trans-unit.source: You’ve made too many attempts to sign in. You won’t be able to try again with this account for 15 minutes.
Continue to Mozilla VPN by signing in with your Firefox account
trans-unit.target: Continuá a la Mozilla VPN iniciando sesión con tu cuenta de Firefox

trans-unit.note: Do not remove or translate the markup '', '', ''.
trans-unit.target: Al continuar, aceptás los términos del servicio y las políticas de privacidad.
trans-unit.source: By continuing, you agree to the Terms of Service and the Privacy Notice.

trans-unit.note: Placeholder text for input element asking user for 8-digit verification code from their email.
Placeholder text for input element asking user for 6-digit verification code from their email.
A badge shown in a message signifying that this is an important message
An action to delete a message from the users inbox
A badge shown in a message signifying an update to the app is available
A badge shown in a message signifying that this message contains a survey
A badge shown in a message signifying that this is a warning message
A badge shown in a message signifying that this message contains information about what is new in the product
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to account issues.

trans-unit.source: When you submit, Mozilla VPN will collect technical and interaction data with your email to help our support team understand your issue.
trans-unit.target: Cuando envíes, Mozilla VPN recopilará datos técnicos y de interacción junto con tu correo electrónico para ayudar a nuestro equipo de ayuda a comprender tu problema.

trans-unit.note: A user trying to submit feedback will use this dropdown to select the general topic related to the feedback.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to requesting new features.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to issues not covered under the other categories.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to payment and billing.

trans-unit.target: Aviso de privacidad sobre Mozilla VPN
Error al enviar tu solicitud de ayuda

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error has occurred, please try again.
trans-unit.target: Hubo un error inesperado, volvé a intentarlo.

trans-unit.source: How can we help you with Mozilla VPN?

trans-unit.note: The %1 represents the email used to complete the form
trans-unit.target: Nuestro equipo de ayuda se pondrá en contacto con vos en %1 una vez que hayamos podido ver tu problema.
trans-unit.source: Our support team will contact you at %1 once we’ve been able to look at your issue.

trans-unit.note: A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to technical issues.
Placeholder text for a search field that can be used to search through a list of languages

trans-unit.source: Stream, download and game without limits, monthly caps or ISP throttling.
trans-unit.target: Stremeá, descargá y jugá sin límites, topes mensuales o frenos de tu ISP.

trans-unit.source: A safe, reliable and fast VPN. Built by the makers of Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Una VPN segura, confiable y rápida. Creada por los autores de Firefox.

trans-unit.source: Route your activity and location through servers in more than 30 countries.
trans-unit.target: Dirigí tu actividad a través de servidores en más de 30 países.

trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN keeps your location and browsing safe from eavesdroppers.
trans-unit.target: La Mozilla VPN mantiene tu ubicación y navegación seguras de curiosos.
Hubo un problema al confirmar la suscripción

trans-unit.source: Your subscription is linked to another Firefox Account. You may need to sign in with a different email address.
trans-unit.target: Tu suscripción está vinculada con otra cuenta de Firefox. Puede que tengas que iniciar la sesión con una dirección de correo diferente.

trans-unit.note: This is alt text for an arrow showing the multi-hop route between servers. e.g. Atlanta TO Copenhagen

trans-unit.source: Multi-hop VPN routes your traffic through two servers instead of one for extra security and privacy. This may slow down your connection.
trans-unit.target: La VPN multisaltos dirige tu tráfico a través de dos servidores en lugar de uno para una mayor seguridad y privacidad. Esto puede lentificar tu conexión.
¿Qué es una VPN con saltos múltiples?

trans-unit.source: Exit location represents your main VPN server.
trans-unit.target: La ubicación de salida representa tu principal servidor VPN.

trans-unit.source: No results. Try a different search
trans-unit.target: No hay resultados. Probá una búsqueda distinta

trans-unit.note: Label for the tab on the navigation bar that takes the user to the home screen
Label for the tab on the navigation bar that takes the user to the messages inbox screen
Label for the tab on the navigation bar that takes the user to the settings screen

trans-unit.source: To continue subscribing, please sign in to your Google Account
trans-unit.target: Para continuar la suscripción, ingresá a tu cuenta de Google
Ingresá a tu cuenta de Google

trans-unit.source: The guest Wi-Fi network you’re connected to requires action. Click to turn off VPN to see the portal.
trans-unit.target: La red Wi-Fi para invitados a la que estás conectado requiere acción. Hacé clic para desactivar la VPN y ver el portal.
El portal de Wi-Fi para invitados está bloqueado

trans-unit.source: The guest Wi-Fi network you’re connected to may not be secure. Click to turn on VPN to secure your device.
trans-unit.target: Es posible que la red Wi-Fi para invitados a la que estás conectado no sea segura. Hacé clic para activar la VPN y proteger tu dispositivo.
Se detectó el portal de Wi-Fi para invitados.

trans-unit.note: %1 is the Wi-Fi network name
trans-unit.target: %1 no es seguro. Hacé clic aquí para activar la VPN y asegurar tu dispositivo.
trans-unit.source: %1 is not secure. Click here to turn on VPN and secure your device.

trans-unit.target: Se detectó una red Wi-Fi insegura

trans-unit.source: Sorry, we are unable to connect your Firefox Account to a current subscription. Please try again or contact our support team for further assistance.
trans-unit.target: Disculpá pero no pudimos conectar tu cuenta de Firefox a una suscripción actual. Volvé a intentarlo o comunicate con nuestro equipo de ayuda.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, we were unable to confirm your subscription. Please try again or contact our support team for help.
trans-unit.target: Disculpá, no pudimos confirmar tu suscripción. Por favor, volvé a intentarlo o conectate con nuestro equipo de ayuda.

trans-unit.source: Another Firefox Account has already subscribed using this Apple ID. Please sign out and try again or contact our support team for help.
trans-unit.target: Otra cuenta de Firefox ya se suscribió usando esta Apple ID. Registrate de nuevo o contactate con nuestro equipo de ayuda.

trans-unit.source: This server location is temporarily unavailable. Choose a new location.
trans-unit.target: Esta ubicación del servidor no está disponible temporalmente. Elegí una nueva ubicación.

trans-unit.source: This server location is temporarily unavailable. Please open the app to choose a new location.
trans-unit.target: La ubicación de este servidor no está disponible en este momento. Abrí la aplicación para elegir una nueva ubicación.

trans-unit.source: The server has been blocked. Check your firewall settings.
Get notified when connecting to a server location failed
trans-unit.target: Recibir una notificación cuando falla la conexión a una ubicación del servidor

trans-unit.source: No results. Try a different search
trans-unit.target: No hay resultados. Probá una búsqueda distinta

trans-unit.note: This is the description of a checkbox option to allow the app to send crash reports without a user prompt
trans-unit.target: Permitir que Mozilla VPN envíe automáticamente informes de fallos para ayudar a solucionar colgadas inesperadas
trans-unit.source: Allow Mozilla VPN to automatically send crash reports to help fix unexpected crashes
Allow Mozilla VPN to send technical, interaction, and campaign and referral data to Mozilla
trans-unit.target: Permitir que Mozilla VPN envíe datos técnicos, de interacción, de campañas y referencias a Mozilla

trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN will launch and connect when you start up your device
trans-unit.target: La Mozilla VPN se iniciará y se conectará cuando inicies tu dispositivo

trans-unit.note: Startup refers to a device's startup, not the VPN client's.
Tunnel is used as a verb, as in to direct traffic through
trans-unit.target: Envía la VPN a través del puerto 53/DNS

trans-unit.source: Use port 53/DNS for Wireguard traffic, which may help evade firewalls
trans-unit.target: Usá el puerto 53/DNS para el tráfico de Wireguard, que puede ayudarte a evadir cortafuegos/firewalls

trans-unit.source: VPN must be restarted to take effect
trans-unit.target: La VPN debe reiniciarse para que surta efecto

trans-unit.source: Show or hide the developer options menu
trans-unit.target: Mostrar u ocultar el menú de opciones de desarrollador

trans-unit.source: Staging services are used to test features before they go live to production
trans-unit.target: Los servicios de prueba se utilizan para probar las funciones antes de que lleguen a la producción

trans-unit.note: This displays as informational text below split tunneling settings. The link directs to a sumo article which will help certain users who are having network issues using this feature.
trans-unit.target: Para cualquier pregunta sobre cómo configurar los permisos de las aplicaciones, proporcionamos algunos consejos útiles en nuestro sitio web.
trans-unit.source: For any questions about setting app permissions, we’ve provided some helpful tips on our website.

trans-unit.note: Displayed in a notification as "call to action" when apps are missing from the split-tunnel settings.
Displayed in notification after the user added a missing app to the split-tunnel List; %1 is the name of the added application
trans-unit.source: Success! You added “%1” to this list.

trans-unit.note: Apps listed in the split-tunnel settings. %1 is the number of missing apps If necessary, this can be translated as "Apps missing from list :%1"
trans-unit.target: Falta el %1 de las apps de la lista.

trans-unit.note: Label for the date on which the subscription was activated.
Label for the date on which the payment method expires.
The %1 represents the last four digits of a credit card.
Label for the upcoming date on which the subscription will expire.
Label for a button that will take the user to a view where they can manage their subscription.
Menu title for a view with details on the users account.
Label for the upcoming date on which the user will be billed for their subscription.
Headline for a list with information on the payment information the user provided for their subscription.
Label for the selected subscription plan the user currently is subscribed to.
The %1 represents a localized currency string.
The %1 represents a localized currency string.
The %1 represents a localized currency string.
Text for a label that indicates an active subscription.
Text for a label that indicates an inactive subscription.
Label for the current status of the subscription.
The %1 represents the subscription platform. Values for %1 could be “Apple” or “Google” for example.
Headline for a list with information on the subscription plan of the user.
Location in the systray. %1 is the country, %2 is the city.

trans-unit.source: We strive to provide you with choices and collect only the data we need to improve Mozilla VPN. Sharing this data with Mozilla is optional.
trans-unit.target: Nos esforzamos por ofrecerte opciones y recopilar solo los datos que necesitamos para mejorar Mozilla VPN. Compartir estos datos con Mozilla es opcional.

trans-unit.source: Allow Mozilla VPN to send technical, interaction, and campaign and referral data to Mozilla?
trans-unit.target: ¿Permitir que Mozilla VPN envíe datos técnicos, de interacción, de campañas y referencias a Mozilla?

trans-unit.source: Let us help you learn more about Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Te ayudamos a sacar el máximo provecho de la Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: Take a tour of Mozilla VPN to learn how the latest features help you protect your online privacy.
trans-unit.target: Hacé un recorrido por la Mozilla VPN para conocer la forma en que las características más recientes te ayudan a proteger tu privacidad en línea.

trans-unit.source: Here’s a great list of useful tips and tricks to get the best out of your Mozilla VPN experience. Check it out now or find it anytime in the settings.
trans-unit.target: Aquí hay una gran lista de consejos útiles y trucos para sacar el mejor provecho de la Mozilla VPN. Miralo ahora o encontrala en los ajustes en cualquier momento.

trans-unit.source: Check out some of our other interactive tutorials
Let us help you get the most out of Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Te ayudamos a sacar el máximo provecho de Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.note: Tab title for the general tab of the Tips & Tricks panels
Tab title for the tab of the Tips & Tricks panels that only shows guides
Tab title for the tab of the Tips & Tricks panels that only shows tutorials

trans-unit.source: Learn the basics of Mozilla VPN
Looks like you haven’t finished the tutorial quite yet. Would you like to continue and finish now or quit and come back later?
trans-unit.target: Parece que todavía no terminaste el tutorial. ¿Te gustaría continuar y terminar ahora o salir y volver más tarde?

trans-unit.source: You currently have the latest version of Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Actualmente tenés la última versión de Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: Click to update to the latest version of the application
trans-unit.target: Hacer clic para actualizar a la última versión de la aplicación

trans-unit.source: You can now run speed tests in Mozilla VPN! Select the performance icon in the top left corner of your screen to test your connection speed while using VPN.
trans-unit.target: ¡Ahora podés ejecutar pruebas de velocidad en Mozilla VPN! Seleccioná el ícono de rendimiento en la esquina superior izquierda de la pantalla para probar la velocidad de tu conexión mientras usás VPN.

trans-unit.source: You can now run speed tests within the VPN to check your connection speed.
trans-unit.target: Ahora podés ejecutar pruebas de velocidad dentro de la VPN para verificar la velocidad de tu conexión.

trans-unit.source: Custom DNS settings allow for faster connection using local servers.
trans-unit.target: La configuración de DNS personalizados permite una conexión más rápida usando servidores locales.

trans-unit.source: Custom DNS servers allow for faster speed using local networks, features like ad-blocking and anti-tracking. You can find this feature in the “Network settings” section.
trans-unit.target: Los servidores DNS personalizados permiten una velocidad más rápida usando las redes locales, y funcionalidades como el bloqueo de publicidad y rastreo. Podés encontrar esta función en la sección "Configuración de red".

trans-unit.source: Now accessible from the VPN app, users can view their personal information, subscription summary and payment information within the subscription profile page.
trans-unit.target: Ahora accesible desde la aplicación VPN, los usuarios pueden ver su información personal, el resumen de la suscripción e información de pago dentro de la página del perfil de la suscripción.

trans-unit.source: You can now use different Mozilla VPN locations in multiple tabs simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: Ahora podés usar diferentes ubicaciones de la VPN de Mozilla en múltiples pestañas simultáneamente.

trans-unit.note: “Multi-Account Containers” is the name of the add-on and should not be translated.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN ahora está integrada con el complemento Multi-Account Containers para mayor privacidad y seguridad.
trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN is now integrated with the Multi-Account Containers add-on for more privacy and security.
Multi-hop VPN uses multiple VPN servers instead of one for extra security and privacy.
trans-unit.target: La VPN multisaltos utiliza varios servidores VPN en lugar de uno para mayor seguridad y privacidad.

trans-unit.source: Multi-hop VPN will route your traffic through a second server for added protection. You can find this feature on the “Select location” screen.
trans-unit.target: La VPN multisaltos desviará tu tráfico a través de un segundo servidor para mayor protección. Podés encontrar esta función en la pantalla "Seleccionar ubicación".

trans-unit.source: The in-app support form will streamline the process of getting your issues resolved.
trans-unit.target: El formulario de ayuda dentro de la aplicación simplificará el proceso para resolver tus problemas.
Formulario de ayuda dentro de la aplicación

trans-unit.source: The in-app support form will allow you to contact support from within the VPN app. You can find it in the “Get help” section.
trans-unit.target: El formulario de ayuda de la aplicación te permitirá contactar con el equipo de ayuda desde la aplicación VPN. Podés encontrarlo en la sección "Obtener ayuda".
Formulario de ayuda dentro de la aplicación

trans-unit.source: We’ve added a ton of cool features in this latest release. Take the tour to get a deeper dive into what we’ve added for you!
trans-unit.target: Agregamos un montón de funcionalidades increíbles en esta última versión. ¡Hacé el tour para profundizar en lo que agregamos para vos!
¿Qué hay de nuevo en la VPN?

trans-unit.source: Check out all the new features available in the latest version of Mozilla VPN!
trans-unit.target: ¡Revisá todas las nuevas características disponibles en la última versión de la Mozilla VPN!
